swtransparencyd(8) System Manager's Manual swtransparencyd(8)

NAME

swtransparencyd — The swtransparency daemon.

DESCRIPTION

swtransparencyd swtransparencyd is a system daemon that verifies software transparency information for Apple Inteligence and other clients.

swtransparencyd is not intended to be invoked directly, but launchd though launchd.

SEE ALSO

transparencyd(8) launchd(8) launchd.conf(5)

7 Jan, 2025 Darwin
